People

The project is currently managed by Justin Cappos at New York University’s Secure Systems Lab. Many people have contributed to the project since its inception, including academics, professional developers, and contributors from the open-source community.

Please visit the governance page to learn how project decisions are made, and an explanation of the project roles used below.

Special gratitude is given to the individuals from the open-source community who have contributed to the TUF project over the years.
